item.title: Open Jam 2020 Recap
item.description: Open Jam 2020 was the second Open Jam. For 80 hours, from September 18-21st, Open Jammers made twenty-seven open source games, using open source tools. The theme was AIRBORNE. After a round of peer voting, the results are in! First place goes to: Jurassic Snowpark Created by Alligator Ventures; in this game you play as a snowboarding dinosaur. Take to the slopes, earn money to buy upgrades for your snowboard.

item.title: Open Jam 2019 is ON!
item.description: Mark your calendar! Open Jam 2019 will take place this September 27-30. Here is the schedule (times are automatically localized to your timezone). September 27 2019 1:00 PM EDT, the jam begins! We will announce the theme. … 80 hours of creativity! … September 30 2019 9:00 PM EDT, the jam concludes. For the week after the jam ends, you’ll peer-review the other submitted games and rate them in categories like fun, graphics, audio, etc.

item.title: Open Jam 2018 Recap
item.description: Open Jam 2018 was the second Open Jam. During 80 hours, from October 5-8th, roughly fifty brave creators made open source games, using open source tools. The theme was spam to win. The three top-rated games earned a spot on the floor at All Things Open 2018. Check out the results over on the itch.io JAM PAGE!
